title: The Warriors Are Back on Top of the NBA | The Answer
description:
Chris and Seerat start by sharing their reactions to the Warriors winning the NBA championship. They discuss all the factors, moments, and player moves that Golden State made that contributed to their success, and then speculate on what’s next for the Boston Celtics.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Producer: Chris Sutton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
